pr_title: Replace menu string “Options” with either “Deck options” or “Study options”

timeline.bodyText: This looks suspect - I can only imagine that we added the null check in there in order to stop a crash or similar. To remove a null check with no associated change to protect against the possibility of null in the same commit can't be right. Even if it is in a following commit it might make later git bisect's while hunting for bugs crash as it is not altered in the same commit
timeline.author: mikehardy

replies.bodyText: i removed the null check because if mToolbar is null the app has already crashed at that point. still, this change probably shouldn't be a part of this PR so i removed it
replies.author: oakkitten

replies.bodyText: oh my - nice link there, haha. Yep indeed, just a littttle silly to null check now that I look at that but thank you for separating concerns regardless 😅
replies.author: mikehardy
